==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|べい|えい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[米]] ''[[rice]]'', which is the second character in and often serves as an abbreviation for [[亜米利加]] ''America''/''American'' (compare [[米国]] and [[米国人]]) + [[英]] ''Britain''/''British'' (compare [[英語]], [[英国]], and [[英和]]).

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|べいえい}}

# [[America]] and [[Britain]]
# American-British
# {{lb|ja|obsolete|sort=べいえい}} [[Americans]] and [[Britons]]

[[ja:米英]]
